name: AlterPsModuleVersion
description: Alter ModuleVersion Element stored in a Windows PowerShell data file (.psd1).
author: Richie Lee

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: New ModuleVersion Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the ModuleVersion Number element to this value in the psd1 file.

inputs.name: file
inputs.label: psd1 File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filepath to the Windows PowerShell data file (.psd1).
